set.name: SMB
set.longname: Magic the Gathering | Super Mario Brothers

card.name: MX01 Cookatiel, Kooky Cook
card.text: Flying, lifelink Damage from sources you control can't be prevented. Whenever you gain life, put that many +1/+1 counters on Cookatiel.

card.name: 2 MV Guard Broggy
card.text: Vigilance {1}, Sacrifice this creature: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Koopa Paratroopa
card.text: Flying Whenever another Minion or Noble you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

card.name: Mini Mushroom
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -10/-0 and has mana value 1.

card.name: Cappy, Capture Companion
card.text: Bestow {5}{U}{U} (If you cast this card for his bestow cost, he's an Aura spell with enchant creature. He becomes a creature again if he's not attached.) You control enchanted creature. Enchanted creature gets +0/+2. {5}{U}{U}: Exile Cappy, then return him to the battlefield bestowed on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery and only if Cappy is a creature.

card.name: The Ice Vellumental
card.text: The Ice Vellumental enters tapped with two stun counters on it. Whenever you remove a stun counter from The Ice Vellumental, tap target creature you don't control and put a stun counter on it.

card.name: Frog Suit
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature is a Frog in addition to its other types and can't be blocked. Stock (You may cast a copy of this spell from your graveyard by exiling this card in addition to its other costs.)

card.name: Warp Cannons
card.text: When this artifact enters, surveil 2, then clear a stage. (Draw a card, then discard a card. Every third stage you clear, you clear a world, draw a card and create a Treasure token instead.) {2}, {T}: Clear a stage.

card.name: Mischievous Bandits
card.text: Menace When this creature enters, each opponent discards a card and loses 1 life. You gain 1 life.

card.name: Bowser's Big Suck
card.text: This spell costs {2} less to cast if you control a Noble. Exile target creature or planeswalker.

card.name: Tatanga, Mysterious Spaceman
card.text: Flying, lifelink Other nontoken creatures you control have expendable 1. (Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, create a 1/1 black Minion creature token with "This token can't block.")

card.name: Kleptomaniac Condor
card.text: Flying When this creature enters, exile target card from an opponent's graveyard. If it has mana value 1 or less, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into its owner's graveyard, exile it instead.

card.name: Poisonous Mushroom
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has deathtouch. Stock (You may cast a copy of this spell from your graveyard by exiling this card in addition to its other costs.)

card.name: Fire Bro
card.text: When this creature enters, it deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.

card.name: Birdo, Egg Bombardier
card.text: Birdo can't be blocked except by X or more creatures, where X is two plus the number of permanents attached to her. Whenever Birdo deals combat damage to an opponent for the first time each turn, untap another target creature you control. There's an additional combat phase after this phase.

card.name: Boom Boom, Henchturtle
card.text: First strike, trample, haste

card.name: Lakithunder, Lakitu Boss
card.text: Flying Ward—Pay 3 life. (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays 3 life.) Whenever you cast an artifact, Minion, or Noble spell, Lakithunder deals 1 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Karter's Focus
card.text: Enchant creature or Vehicle you control Enchanted permanent has menace. When this Aura enters and whenever enchanted permanent becomes tapped, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Hungry Maw-Maw
card.text: Trample When this creature enters, you gain 2 life.

card.name: 3 MV Scuttlebug
card.text: Reach Expendable 1 (When this creature dies, create a 1/1 black Minion creature token with "This token can't block.")

card.name: Into the Portrait
card.text: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal an Aura, Hero, Noble, or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Gutsy Galoomba
card.text: {1}{G}: This creature gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.

card.name: Blue and Yellow, Elite Toads
card.text: Trample Whenever an enchantment is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Blue and Yellow.

card.name: Peewee Piranha, Temperamental
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Minion and/or Noble creature you control and each Minion and/or Noble creature card in your graveyard. Haste Pewee Piranha can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

card.name: Potted Uproot
card.text: Reach Whenever another Minion or Noble you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. When a Noble you control enters, you may have this creature deals damage equal to its power to up to one target creature with flying. Do this only once each turn.

card.name: Torpedo Ted
card.text: Flying, haste Whenever another artifact you control enters, if it doesn't share a name with another artifact you control or an artifact card in your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

card.name: Chincho Swarm
card.text: Menace Whenever this creature attacks, another target attacking Minion or Noble gains lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Blooper Nanny
card.text: Expendable 1 (When this creature dies, create a 1/1 black Minion creature token with "This token can't block.") Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 black Minion creature token with "This token can't block."

card.name: Huey, Paint Pal
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. When you use this mana to cast a multicolored spell, you gain 1 life for each of its colors beyond the first. Exhaust — {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}, {T}: Put two +1/+1 counters on Huey, then you draw two cards and gain 2 life. Huey becomes all colors. (Activate each exhaust ability only once.)

card.name: Bone Piranha Plant
card.text: Reach, deathtouch Whenever another creature you control dies, target opponent loses 1 life. If this is the third time that player lost life this way this turn, they discard a card.

card.name: Bob-omb Buddy
card.text: Lifelink When this creature enters, another target creature you control gains lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Captured Glydon
card.text: Flying Whenever this creature attacks, you may pay {2}{W}. If you do, it gains double strike until end of turn. Otherwise, it gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Whacka Bump
card.text: Flash When this artifact enters, target creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.

card.name: Starlow, Guiding Voice
card.text: Flying At the beginning of your end step, if an Aura entered under your control this turn, you scry 1 and gain 1 life.

card.name: Jump Up, Super Star!
card.text: Choose one — • Target creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn. • Return target Aura card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to target creature.

card.name: Toad House Assistant
card.text: Vigilance Aura spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Cat Mario
card.text: Vigilance Whenever Cat Mario attacks, create a 1/1 white Cat Hero creature token with vigilance that's attacking. If Cat Mario is enchanted, that token gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Koops, Timid Turtle
card.text: Koops enters with a shield counter on him. (If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.) Exhaust — {6}{W}: Put a +1/+1 counter and two shield counters on Koops. (Activate each exhaust ability only once.)

card.name: Pipe Cork
card.text: Enchant basic land you control When this Aura enters, exile target creature or artifact an opponent controls until this Aura leaves the battlefield. Enchanted land has "{T}: Scry 1."

card.name: Parakarry, Mailman
card.text: Flying Whenever Parakarry attacks, another target attacking creature and up to one other attacking legendary creature gain flying until end of turn.

card.name: Racetrack Lakitu
card.text: Flash Flying When this creature enters, return target creature you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Mushroom Kingdom
card.text: This land enters tapped unless you control a legendary creature. {T}: Add {W}. Exhaust — {4}{W}, {T}: Exile target Aura card from your graveyard, then create a token that's a copy of it. Activate only as a sorcery. (Activate each exhaust ability only once.)

card.name: Dr. Mario
card.text: Lifelink When Dr. Mario enters, you may choose one — • Exile another target creature you control. At the beginning of the next end step, return it to the battlefield. • Exile target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard. At the beginning of the next end step, put it onto the battlefield.

card.name: Swordfighter Peach
card.text: When Swordfighter Peach enters, you may put an Equipment card from your hand or graveyard onto the battlefield. Equipment you control have equip {0}.

card.name: End of Sammer's Kingdom
card.text: Destroy all nonland permanents. You may return up to one Hero card in your graveyard destroyed this way to the battlefield tapped.

card.name: The Honey Queen
card.text: Flying, vigilance, lifelink Other Insects you control get +1/+1 and have lifelink At the beginning of your end step, create a tapped 1/1 white Insect creature token with flying for each token you created this turn.

card.name: Nimble Ninji
card.text: This creature can't be blocked. {6}{U}, Sacrifice this creature: Draw two cards.

card.name: Rip Van Fish
card.text: Defender As long as you control another Minion or Noble, this creature can attack as though it didn't have defender.

card.name: Sidestepper
card.text: Vigilance {4}{U}, {T}: Surveil 1, then draw a card. (To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Camera Lakitu
card.text: Flying When this creature enters, look at the top three cards of your library. Put them back on top in any order, then draw a card.

card.name: Tattle
card.text: Look at target opponent's hand and the top card of their library. Surveil 1, then draw a card. (To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Goombella, Archaeology Student
card.text: Whenever Goombella or another Hero or Noble you control enter, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.) {2}{U}, Exile three cards from your graveyard: Draw two cards, then discard a card.

card.name: Magic Whistle
card.text: Target creature you control can't be blocked this turn. Clear a stage. (Draw a card, then discard a card. Every third stage you clear, you clear a world, draw a card and create a Treasure token instead.)

card.name: Sushie, Romantic Cheep
card.text: Flash When Sushie enters, each opponent returns a creature they control to its owner's hand. You may return another creature you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Cape Mario
card.text: Flash Flying Cape Mario enters tapped. You may cast spells targeting Cape Mario as though they had flash.

card.name: Cheep Cheep
card.text: Flash When this creature enters, target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn. {1}{U}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a 1/1 black Minion creature token with "This token can't block."

card.name: Helpful Water Dragon
card.text: Flash Affinity for enchantments (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each enchantment you control.) This creature enters tapped. When this creature enters, you and creatures you control gain hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Penguin Mario
card.text: Whenever one or more creatures your opponents control become tapped, if they aren't being declared as attackers, put a stun counter on each of those creatures. {2}{U}, Remove three stun counters from among permanents you don't control: Draw two cards.

card.name: Aggressive Maw-Ray
card.text: Flash Whenever this creature enters or attacks, clear a stage, then put a +1/+1 on it for each card you've drawn this turn. (Draw a card, then discard a card. Every third stage you clear, you clear a world, draw a card and create a Treasure token instead.)

card.name: Comet Observatory
card.text: This land enters tapped unless you control a legendary creature. {T}: Add {U}. Exhaust — {4}{U}, {T}: One or two target creatures you control each get +1/+1 and gain flying until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery. (Activate each exhaust ability only once.)

card.name: Koopa Troopa
card.text: Expendable 2 (When this creature dies, create a 2/2 black Minion creature token with "This token can't block.")

card.name: Mr. I
card.text: Menace Whenever this creature attacks, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Swoops Swarm
card.text: Flying, lifelink When this creature enters, it deals 1 damage to any target. If that target was dealt damage this turn, this creature deals 3 damage to it instead.

card.name: Dry Bones
card.text: This creature can't block. {4}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each Minion and/or Noble you control.

card.name: Ms. Mowz, Flirty Thief
card.text: Ms. Mowz can't be blocked by creatures with greater power. Kiss Thief — When Ms. Mowz enters, target opponent exiles a card from their hand. For as long as that card remains exiled, you may play it and you may spend mana as though it was mana of any color to cast it.

card.name: Skeleton Mario
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever Skeleton Mario deals combat damage to a player, you lose 1 life and clear a stage. (Draw a card, then discard a card. Every third stage you clear, you clear a world, draw a card and create a Treasure token instead.) Whenever you clear a world, each opponent loses 3 life.

card.name: Waluigi, Rude Racer
card.text: Menace Whenever Walugi becomes tapped, up to one target creature or Vehicle you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn. If you targeted Waluigi or a Vehicle this way, you lose 1 life and create a tapped Treasure token.

card.name: Bowser's Clown Car
card.text: Flying, menace When Bowser's Clown Car enters, create Junior's Clown Car, a 3/3 legendary black Vehicle artifact creature token with flying and crew 2. Whenever one or more creatures you control deals combat damage to a player, that player loses half their life, rounded up. Crew 3

card.name: Cosmic Mario
card.text: Indestructible Whenever Cosmic Mario deals combat damage to a player, each opponent may sacrifice a legendary creature. Each opponent who doesn't loses half their life, rounded up. {2}{B}, Sacrifice another legendary creature: Cosmic Mario can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Mad Piano
card.text: Menace Whenever a source deals damage to this creature, that source's controller loses that much life.

card.name: King Boo
card.text: Flying When King Boo enters, create X 1/1 black Spirit Minion creature tokens with flying and "This token can't block", where X is the number of different names among creature cards in your graveyard. {1}{B}, Sacrifice a Minion: You draw a card and each player loses 2 life.

card.name: Wario, Greedy Antihero
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to an opponent, that player exiles the top card of their library. If a land card is exiled this way, that player loses 2 life. Otherwise, that player may pay life equal to the exiled card's mana value. If they don't, you create a number of Treasure tokens equal to that card's mana value.

card.name: Crushing Thwomps
card.text: Trample Expendable 2 (When this creature dies, create a 2/2 black Minion creature token with "This token can't block.")

card.name: Fire Piranha
card.text: Reach {2}{R}: This creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. If mana from a Treasure was spent to activate this ability, create a Treasure token.

card.name: Monty Mole
card.text: First strike, haste This creature can't be blocked by creatures with flying.

card.name: Shy Guy
card.text: Haste {R}, Sacrifice this creature: It deals 2 damage to any target that was dealt damage this turn.

card.name: Bob-omb
card.text: Whenever this creature attacks, put a fuse counter on it. Then you may sacrifice this creature. When this creature dies, it deals damage equal to the number of fuse counters on it to target opponent.

card.name: Bob-ombs Away!!
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Bob-ombs Away!! deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power divided as you choose among one or two targets.

card.name: Fire Flower
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has "Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it deals damage equal to its power divided as you choose among the creatures blocking it." Stock (You may cast a copy of this spell from your graveyard by exiling this card in addition to its other costs.)

card.name: Goombario, Mario's Friend
card.text: When Goombario enters, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card. Charge — {2}{R}: Goombario gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Multibonk — {1}{R}: Goombaria gains double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Woolly Sniffit
card.text: Reach Whenever an opponent casts a spell with one or more targets, this creature deals 2 damage to that player.

card.name: Coin Coffer
card.text: Menace Whenever this creature is dealt damage, create that many tapped Treasure tokens.

card.name: Bombette, Bombastic Starlet
card.text: When Bombette enters or is sacrificed, destroy up to one target artifact or nonbasic land. If a nonbasic land was destroyed this way, its controller may search their library for a basic land, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. {2}{R}{R}: Sacrifice Bombette.

card.name: Dancer Mario
card.text: Ward—Pay 6 life. Whenever one or more Heroes and/or Nobles you control deal combat damage to a player, exile the top card of your library. If you exiled a land this way, put a +1/+1 counter on Dancer Mario. Otherwise, you may cast that spell without paying its mana cost.

card.name: March of the Minis
card.text: For each creature you control, create a token that's a copy of that creature except it's a 1/1 Toy artifact in addition to its other types, it has haste, and it isn't legendary. At the beginning of your next end step, sacrifice each of those tokens.

card.name: Bullet Bill Blaster
card.text: Whenever you attack, put a bomber counter on this artifact, then create a 1/1 red Construct Minion artifact creature token with flying and "At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice this token" that's tapped and attacking. Then if this artifact has three or more bomber counters on it, put two +1/+1 counters on that token.

card.name: Strong-Arm Chuckster
card.text: {2}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: The sacrificed creature deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker you don't control. If excess damage is dealt this way, create a Treasure token.

card.name: Unchained Chomp
card.text: Haste Whenever a Minion or Noble you control attacks, it deals 1 damage to the player or permanent it's attacking. At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice this creature.

card.name: Smithy's Stolen Keep
card.text: This land enters tapped unless you control a legendary creature. {T}: Add {R}. Exhaust — {4}{R}, {T}: Create a token that's a copy of target artifact or creature you control except it has haste and "At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice this token." Activate only as a sorcery. (Activate each exhaust ability only once.)

card.name: Back Alley Rex
card.text: Haste When this creature enters, creatures you control gain trample and get +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of Treasures you've sacrificed this turn.

card.name: Goomba Stomp
card.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control. If the creature you control is an enchantment or is enchanted, excess damage is dealt to that creature's controller instead.

card.name: Yoshi Tongue
card.text: Flash Enchant creature When this Aura enters, untap enchanted creature. Draw a card if there is another Aura attached to enchanted creature. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has reach.

card.name: Patrolling Goomba
card.text: When this creature enters, put a +1/+1 counter on another target Minion or Noble you control.

card.name: Towering Pokey
card.text: Reach This creature enters with twice X counters on it. If damage would be dealt to this creature while it has two or more +1/+1 counters on it, prevent that damage and remove two +1/+1 counters from this creature.

card.name: Luigi, Frightened Vacuumeer
card.text: Vigilance When Luigi enters, for each player, choose up to one target permanent card in that player's graveyard. Return a card in your graveyard chose this way to your hand, then exile all other cards chosen this way.

card.name: Yoshi Steed
card.text: Whenever this creature attacks while saddled, target creature defending player controls blocks it this turn if able. Saddle 2 (Tap any number of other creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Mount becomes saddled until end of turn. Saddle only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Bowser Jr., Punk Prince
card.text: Trample When Bowser Jr enters, choose target creature or Vehicle card in your graveyard. If it's a Minion or Vehicle card with mana value 3 or less, you may return it to the battlefield. If a card isn't returned to the battlefield this way, return that card to your hand.

card.name: Captain Toad, Treasure Tracker
card.text: Captain Toad can't be blocked. When Captain Toad enters, clear a stage. (Draw a card, then discard a card. Every third stage you clear, you clear a world, draw a card and create a Treasure token instead.) Whenever you clear a world, put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.

card.name: Chargin' Chuck
card.text: Haste Other Minions and Nobles you control get +1/+0.

card.name: Coin Rush
card.text: Creatures you control have haste. Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: DK, Core Delver

card.name: Kammy Koopa, the Brains
card.text: Flash Flying When Kammy Koopa enters, counter target spell you don't control unless its controller pays {2}. If you control two or more other Minions and/or Nobles, counter that spell unless its controller pays {4} instead.

card.name: Ludwig Von Koopa, Composer

card.name: Merlee's Luck Spell
card.text: Draw two cards, then discard a card. You gain 2 life.

card.text: Vigilance Whenever you draw your second card each turn, create a 1/1 white Citizen creature token. {6}, {T}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain flying until end of turn. Activate only during your turn.

card.text: When Princes Shroob enters, create a 1/1 black Alien Minion creature token with "This token can't block." {BG}, Sacrifice another creature: Surveil 1. You may have Princess Shroob gain indestructible until end of tun. If you do, tap her.

card.name: Star Road Map
card.text: Whenever you attack, clear a stage. (Draw a card, then discard a card. Every third stage you clear, you clear a world, draw a card and create a Treasure token instead.) Whenever you clear a world, return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Super Acorn
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each enchantment you control and has flying. Power-up (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, remove all damage from it and sacrifice this Aura instead.)

card.name: Antasma, Evil Bat King
card.text: Flying, lifelink Whenever you draw a card, Antasma deals 1 damage to each opponent. They each mill two cards.

card.name: Galaxy's Rebirth
card.text: Return each permanent card in your graveyard that was put there from the battlefield this turn to the battlefield. Take an extra turn after this one. Exile this spell.

card.name: Count Bleck
card.text: Flying, vigilance If a card would be put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead. Whenever Count Bleck attacks, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life and surveil 1. If there are eight or more cards in exile, each opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life and surveil 3 instead.

card.name: Fawful, Beanish Brainiac
card.text: Menace At the beginning of your end step, for each opponent that lost life this turn, exile the top card of that player's library. Until your next end step, you may play those cards and mana of any type can be spent to cast a spell this way. Pay 3 life: Add {C}. Spend this mana only to cast spells from exile.

card.text: Destroy all nonland permanents. Create a 1/1 black Pest creature token for each permanent you controlled that was destroyed this way.

card.name: Goomboss, Grand Pooh-bah
card.text: Trample Whenever Goomboss is dealt damage, create that many 1/1 green Fungus Minion creature tokens. Whenever a Minion you control dies, put a number of +1/+1 counters on Goomboss equal to that creature's power.

card.name: King Bob-omb
card.text: Deathtouch Ward—Pay life equal to King Bob-omb's power. Whenever a source you control deals noncombat damage to a permanent, that permanent's controller sacrifices it.

card.name: King Bowser, the Mighty
card.text: Whenever King Bowser or another nontoken Minion or Noble you control enters, amass Minion 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also a Minion. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Minion Army creature token first.) {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Put two +1/+1 counters on King Bowser, then each other Minion and Noble you control has base power equal to his power until end of turn.

card.name: Lady Bow, Boo Princess
card.text: Double strike Outta Sight — Whenever Lady Bow deals combat damage to a player, exile up to one other target nonland permanent you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: The Lord of Lightning
card.text: This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the greatest power among creatures you don't control. Flying, first strike, haste Whenever The Lord of Lightning attacks, defending player discards a card and sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Petey Piranha
card.text: Flying, trample When Petey Piranha enters, for each opponent, choose up to one target creature they control. Each other creature you control that's a Minion, Noble, and/or Plant deals damage equal to its power to each of those targets.

card.name: Rosalina, Cosmic Guardian
card.text: Flying Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, create a 1/1 colorless Star enchantment creature tokens with flying. If that spell is an Aura, draw a card. {3}{G}{W}{U}: Each creature token, enchantment creature, and enchanted creature you control gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Toadsworth, Old Aid
card.text: Spells you cast that target a creature cost {2} less to cast. Once during each of your turns, you may cast an Aura spell from your graveyard. If you do, it enters with a finality counter on it.

card.name: Mechawiggler, New Donk Terror
card.text: Trample, haste Whenever Mechawiggler attacks, it fights up to one target creature defending player controls. Mechawiggler gets +X/+0, where X is the amount of damage dealt to it this turn.

card.name: Madame Flurrie, Charming
card.text: Flying, vigilance Gale Force — When Madame Flurrie enters, for each Hero and/or Noble you control, return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Bowser's Kingdom
card.text: This land enters tapped unless you control a legendary creature. {T}: Add {B}. Exhaust — {5}{B}, {T}: Create two X/X black Minion creature tokens with "This token can't block", where X is the greatest power among creature cards in your graveyard. Activate only as a sorcery. (Activate each exhaust ability only once.)

card.name: Toadette, Princess's Favored
card.text: When Toadette enters, create a 1/1 white Fungus Citizen creature token. Whenever one or more Auras you control are put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you gain 2 life and draw a card.

card.name: Tutankoopa, Pyramid Wizard
card.text: Whenever you gain life for the first time during each of your turns, create a 2/1 red Dog Minion artifact creature token. Whenever you lose life for the first time during each of your turns, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

card.name: Dr. Goomba Tower
card.text: When this creature enters, draw a card. Whenever another creature you control enters, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Viral Outbreak
card.text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. Its controller loses 2 life.

card.name: ? Block
card.text: This artifact enters with three coin counters on it. {T}, Remove a coin counter from this artifact: Create a tapped Treasure token. Then if this artifact has no coin counters on it, sacrifice it and exile the top two cards of your library. You may play those cards until the end of your next turn.

card.name: Firebrand Mario
card.text: When Firebrand Mario enters, create a Super token attached to him. (It's a colorless Aura enchantment token with enchant creature and "Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.) Whenever Firebrand Mario deals combat damage to an opponent, you may sacrifice an Aura. If you do, destroy target artifact that player controls.

card.name: Super Mushroom
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has vigilance. Stock (You may cast a copy of this spell from your graveyard by exiling this card in addition to its other costs.)

card.name: Super Mario Bros
card.text:
Flash
When Super Mario Bros enter, return any number of target Aura cards put into your graveyard or into exile from the battlefield this turn to the battlefield attached to them.

card.name: Raging Broozer
card.text: Menace When this creature enters, target opponent sacrifices a creature of their choice. If they didn't sacrifice a creature with mana value 2 or greater this way, they lose 2 life.

card.name: Luigi Logic
card.text: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control. You may put a land card from among them onto the battlefield tapped, then you may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
